Elya Baskin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elya_Baskin 0 Ilya Zalmanovich Baskin (Latvian: Iļja Baskins, Russian: Илья́ (Э́лиа) За́лманович Ба́скин; born 11 August 1950), known as Elya Baskin, is a Soviet-born American actor. He first gained attention for his role in Moscow on the Hudson (1984), as Robin Williams' character's best friend. Ilya_Zalmanovich_Baskin ( Latvian : Iļja_Baskins , Russian : Илья́ ( Э́лиа ) За́лманович_Ба́скин ; born_11_August_1950 ) , known as Elya_Baskin , is a_Soviet-born_American_actor . He first gained attention for his_role in Moscow on the_Hudson_(_1984_) , as Robin_Williams '_character 's_best_friend .
